medbay.name: medbay
medbay.humanMessage: It's an alien hatchery. Look! A baby alien just hatched! Aww it's cute. It eats your face. You're dead.
medbay.alienMessage: Sweet! You've found your eggs! A baby alien just hatched! Good job, mom! Aww it missed you! You win!

lagoon.name: lagoon
lagoon.humanMessage: You're in a lagoon - a Martian lagoon full of acid. It doesn't smell or anything...just kidding. It's sarin. You dead.
lagoon.alienMessage: You're in a Martian lagoon full of acid. It's paradise! Looks like a great place to settle. Good job! You win!

green_house.name: green_house
green_house.humanMessage: You're in an agricultural lab. Edible stuff is growing all round you. With your green thumb you'll live forever! Good job! You win!
green_house.alienMessage: You're in a lab full of plants growing with lots of water, soil and oxygen. AHHH!! Too much oxygen! You dead.
